description: A thick, chunky cable-knit turtleneck in a rich blue shade, featuring a high collar that offers maximum warmth.
A vibrant, oversized red knit sweater with a slouchy, high ribbed collar and loose sleeves for a relaxed fit.
A heavy, loose-knit beige pullover with a thick rolled neckline and wide ribbed hem, perfect for casual layering.
A classic grey wool sweater featuring a traditional Nordic-style Fair Isle pattern across the chest and upper arms.
